Question: In 1996, this person appeared as superspy Ethan Hunt in the reboot of Mission: Impossible, which he produced.
Hints: In mid-2011, this person started shooting the movie Rock of Ages, in which he played the character Stacee Jaxx.
In 2006, this person sued cybersquatter Jeff Burgar to obtain control of the Tomthis person.com domain name.
The first was its inaugural film, Lions for Lambs, directed by Robert Redford and starring Redford, Meryl Streep and this person.
